!important;}"][vc_custom_heading text="Powerful Customize" font_container="tag:div|font_size:18|text_align:left|color:%23252525|line_height:1.3" use_theme_fonts="yes" css=".vc_custom_1477018786671{padding-bottom: 20px !important;}"][vc_custom_heading text="The Customizer with easy navigation and dozens of theme elements, select hundreds of amazing fonts, apply many pattern backgrounds and setup different theme setting and effects." font_container="tag:div|font_size:15|text_align:left|color:%23555555|line_height:1.6" use_theme_fonts="yes"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1477019435205{padding-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_custom_heading text="Fontawesome Icons" text="Why be satisfied with just one set of icons when you can have two! Choose between the Font Awesome and Font Elegant icon packs." font_container="tag:div|font_size:15|text_align:left|color:%23555555|line_height:1.6" use_theme_fonts="yes"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1477019426958{padding-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_custom_heading text="Awesome Off-Canvas Menus Intergration" font_container="tag:div|font_size:18|text_align:left|color:%23252525|line_height:1.3" use_theme_fonts="yes" css=".vc_custom_1477018977308{padding-bottom: 20px !important;}"][vc_custom_heading text="The new Off-Canvas menus is now independent with Collapse Navigation for small screens. The Off-canvas sidebar displays content from a defined position." font_container="tag:div|font_size:15|text_align:left|color:%23555555|line_height:1.6" use_theme_fonts="yes"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner el_class="max-1170" css=".vc_custom_1477019913741{padding-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_column_inner width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1477019925186{padding-bottom: 20px !important;}"][vc_custom_heading text="One Click Demo Import" font_container="tag:div|font_size:18|text_align:left|color:%23252525|line_height:1.3" use_theme_fonts="yes" css=".vc_custom_1477019954604{padding-bottom: 20px !important;}"][vc_custom_heading text="You can import all the demo content with only one click! We have a huge number of layouts that are easily imported." font_container="tag:div|font_size:15|text_align:left|color:%23555555|line_height:1.6" use_theme_fonts="yes"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1477019918898{padding-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_custom_heading text="Revolution Slider Ready ($19 Value)" font_container="tag:div|font_size:18|text_align:left|color:%23252525|line_height:1.3" use_theme_fonts="yes" css=".vc_custom_1477019966763{padding-bottom: 20px !important;}"][vc_custom_heading text="The award winning Revolution Slider is included with the them worth $15. This beautiful responsive slider allows you to create stunning effects for your site." font_container="tag:div|font_size:15|text_align:left|color:%23555555|line_height:1.6" use_theme_fonts="yes"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][vc_custom_heading text="Visual Composer Included ($35 Value)" font_container="tag:div|font_size:18|text_align:left|color:%23252525|line_height:1.3" use_theme_fonts="yes" css=".vc_custom_1477019977884{padding-bottom: 20px !important;}"][vc_custom_heading text="Visual Composer provides convenience during the site creation. VC Addons give even more customization options." font_container="tag:div|font_size:15|text_align:left|color:%23555555|line_height:1.6" use_theme_fonts="yes"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner el_class="max-1170" css=".vc_custom_1477019913741{padding-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_column_inner width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1477019925186{padding-bottom: 20px !important;}"][vc_custom_heading text="Premium Support & Updates" font_container="tag:div|font_size:18|text_align:left|color:%23252525|line_height:1.3" use_theme_fonts="yes" css=".vc_custom_1477020253555{padding-bottom: 20px !important;}"][vc_custom_heading text="We care about our clients very much. If you have a questions, contact us and we will answer your question shortly and resolve your issue." font_container="tag:div|font_size:15|text_align:left|color:%23555555|line_height:1.6" use_theme_fonts="yes"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1477019918898{padding-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_custom_heading text="Seo Optimised & Solid Code" font_container="tag:div|font_size:18|text_align:left|color:%23252525|line_height:1.3" use_theme_fonts="yes" css=".vc_custom_1477020857357{padding-bottom: 20px !important;}"][vc_custom_heading text="This theme is built with care allowing search engines to index the content of your site to achieve higher rankings." font_container="tag:div|font_size:15|text_align:left|color:%23555555|line_height:1.6" use_theme_fonts="yes"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][vc_custom_heading text="Language Translation" font_container="tag:div|font_size:18|text_align:left|color:%23252525|line_height:1.3" use_theme_fonts="yes" css=".vc_custom_1477020880307{padding-bottom: 20px !important;}"][vc_custom_heading text="The theme includes the required .po & .mo files ready for translation. Easily translate using the Codestyling Location plugin, plug support for WPML & qTranslate for multi-language support." font_container="tag:div|font_size:15|text_align:left|color:%23555555|line_height:1.6" use_theme_fonts="yes"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner el_class="max-1170" css=".vc_custom_1477019913741{padding-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_column_inner width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1477019925186{padding-bottom: 20px !important;}"][vc_custom_heading text="Amazing Layout Variations" font_container="tag:div|font_size:18|text_align:left|color:%23252525|line_height:1.3" use_theme_fonts="yes" css=".vc_custom_1477021375668{padding-bottom: 20px !important;}"][vc_custom_heading text="DID YOU KNOW: You can select your sidebar position (or no sidebar at all), choose a boxed or fullwidth layout and set a custom header, footer for your site all with the click of a button!" font_container="tag:div|font_size:15|text_align:left|color:%23555555|line_height:1.6" use_theme_fonts="yes"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1477019918898{padding-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_custom_heading text="Fully Responsive Web Design" font_container="tag:div|font_size:18|text_align:left|color:%23252525|line_height:1.3" use_theme_fonts="yes" css=".vc_custom_1477021490648{padding-bottom: 20px !important;}"][vc_custom_heading text="It adapts automatically to different screen sizes, no matter if your visitors are on desktop, tablet, or smartphone." font_container="tag:div|font_size:15|text_align:left|color:%23555555|line_height:1.6" use_theme_fonts="yes"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][vc_custom_heading text="WooCommerce Ready" font_container="tag:div|font_size:18|text_align:left|color:%23252525|line_height:1.3" use_theme_fonts="yes" css=".vc_custom_1477453443768{padding-bottom: 20px !important;}"][vc_custom_heading text="Transform your WordPress website intro a thorough-bred ecommerce store for free." font_container="tag:div|font_size:15|text_align:left|color:%23555555|line_height:1.6" use_theme_fonts="yes"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner el_class="max-1170" css=".vc_custom_1477019913741{padding-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_column_inner width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1477019925186{padding-bottom: 20px !important;}"][vc_custom_heading text="Off-Canvas Shopping Cart" font_container="tag:div|font_size:18|text_align:left|color:%23252525|line_height:1.3" use_theme_fonts="yes" css=".vc_custom_1477453465457{padding-bottom: 20px !important;}"][vc_custom_heading text=" Allow your clients to see the products they’ve selected in a glance, with the possibility to add or remove products without being forced to navigate back and forth across the site." font_container="tag:div|font_size:15|text_align:left|color:%23555555|line_height:1.6" use_theme_fonts="yes"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1477019918898{padding-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_custom_heading text="Tailored Quick View" font_container="tag:div|font_size:18|text_align:left|color:%23252525|line_height:1.3" use_theme_fonts="yes" css=".vc_custom_1477453481583{padding-bottom: 20px !important;}"][vc_custom_heading text="Shoppers love to get a good visual sense of the product before purchasing. Provide a beautiful user experience while driving all eyeballs to the products you’re offering." font_container="tag:div|font_size:15|text_align:left|color:%23555555|line_height:1.6" use_theme_fonts="yes"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][vc_custom_heading text="Layered Navigation" font_container="tag:div|font_size:18|text_align:left|color:%23252525|line_height:1.3" use_theme_fonts="yes" css=".vc_custom_1477453505440{padding-bottom: 20px !important;}"][vc_custom_heading text="iOne comes with a powerful Layered Navigation sidebar. It is sleek, lightweight and because it’s off-canvas it stays out of the way until needed. The implemented AJAX technology allows filtering and sorting products without page reloading. And with the included Isotope Library, any layout rearrangement like when switching from grid to list or opening the filters pane is gracefully animated. It just seems magical." font_container="tag:div|font_size:15|text_align:left|color:%23555555|line_height:1.6" use_theme_fonts="yes"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner el_class="max-1170" css=".vc_custom_1477019913741{padding-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_column_inner width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1477019925186{padding-bottom: 20px !important;}"][vc_custom_heading text="Previous & Next functionality for the product view page" font_container="tag:div|font_size:18|text_align:left|color:%23252525|line_height:1.3" use_theme_fonts="yes" css=".vc_custom_1477453661533{padding-bottom: 20px !important;}"][vc_custom_heading text=" Now you can navigate to next and previous products without going back to listing page."
